product.title: MUDMIXER Continuous Feed Portable Electric Concrete, Cement and Mortar Mixer
product.description: Introducing the MUDMIXER: your ultimate solution for fast, efficient mixing in construction projects. Designed to handle concrete, mortar, or stucco with ease, this multi-use mixer boasts adjustable water flow for consistent results every time. Crafted for durability, its heavy-duty steel body and flat-free tires ensure reliability on any job site. Equipped with a 2-phase infusion system, the MUDMIXER combines an auger and water to deliver a seamless flow of mixture, customizable via a fully adjustable water dial. Its patented auger effortlessly handles various mixtures, facilitating swift and precise delivery, reducing labor costs, and increasing productivity. The adjustable water dial customizes the water flow for the desired mixture. Powered by an electric drivetrain with a forward and reverse directional switch, the MUDMIXER can handle over 40 bags per hour, with an integrated bag opener for seamless loading. Compact in size, it easily maneuvers through yard gates for accessibility, while an integrated secondary hose simplifies cleanup. Featuring a 330° pivot system, this mixer offers precision and versatility on any work site. Constructed from 14-gauge high-strength steel, it's built to withstand rigorous demands. The all-electric, water-sealed motor ensures reliable performance, with optional hopper and chute extensions available for added performance. Experience the MUDMIXER difference today.
feature_bullets: Fastest, easiest, multi-use cement mixer on the market
Featuring a fully adjustable water input
Effortlessly provides reliable cement mix consistency
descriptive_attributes: Electric drivetrain has the ability to chew through over 40 - 80 lbs. bags an hour
1/2 HP water-sealed electric motor with forward and reverse operation
330° swivel movement allows for precision placement of cement
Integrated bag opener makes it easy to drop-and-fold the bagged cement
Revolutionary fully adjustable water dial allows for customized water flow for use with concrete, mortar, stucco mix, pool krete and much more
Fits through a gate opening at only 27.5 in. wide
Built on a heavy-duty 14-Gauge steel frame set on marathon flat-free wheels
Attached hose and nozzle allow for easy cleanup
Optional hopper and chute extensions are available
No more batch mixing with MUDMIXER's continuous mixing technology
Enables reliable material consistency - put an end to too soupy or too dry mixes
Saves time and money - cut your workload by more than half
Improves jobsite safety - easily set cement into hopper without struggling to empty pre-mix bags
35 in. stand-over height means you'll never lift another bag above the belt

specifications.name: Manufacturer Warranty
specifications.value: 1-year warrranty against factory defects for any unit used for any purpose including personal, family, or household use, rental, or commercial.
